HotelElement.Name: Solent Hotel & Spa Fareham - Part of the Shire Hotels Group

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Solent Hotel and Spa in Fareham (Whiteley), you'll be minutes from Solent Business Park and close to Segensworth Business Park. This romantic hotel is within close proximity of Titchfield Abbey and Bursledon Brickworks Industrial Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 117 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and espresso makers. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, and flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature designer toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and complimentary weekday newspapers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find an indoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access and wedding services.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Solent Hotel and Spa. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.
